reviewText: Our two-year old son loved this. We try to be cautious about what we allow him to watch, so it was great to find something that was entertaining and engaging for him while also being educational.
My granddaughter is  just  starting to be entertained by TV, and i wanted something educational to watch with her, she loved this DVD.

I bought this for my daughter and she loves it ! She saw the characters on a show and liked it so I figured get a dvd and she can watch it as many times as she wants! The characters are cute and she learns about the earth and animals!
My children like watching this dvd. It has many adventures with Blue and that pleases everyone.
Thank you for having this dvd in stock.  My granddaughter broke hers (from loving use) and I could not find a replacement.  This is a great video of Blue with both Steve and Joe on it.  Thanks again.
My one year old daughter loves it and my son loved it when he was two! Plus, mom and dad think it's amusing too. :)

MY 3Y/O LEARNS SO MUCH FROM THESE DVD'S AND THEY ARE GREAT TO SIT WITH HIM AND MAKE IT INTO FAMILY ACTIVITIES. INSTEAD OF HIM JUST WATCHING SHOWS BY HIMSELF AND NOT REALLY LEARNING HOW TO USE IT IN REAL LIFE, WE TRY TO SHOW HIM HOW TO DO WHAT THEY'RE DOING ON THE DVD HERE AT HOME WITH HIS OWN TOYS/SUPPLIES.

Just like all the other Blue's DVD I have bought this one is also a good one. Just like the other I wish when you hit play all is would also play the bonus shows. My girls don't watch the whole DVD at once. When I shut it off and turn it back on it starts from where I shut it off. The Blues Biggest Stories is really great for that so I don't have to skip through all the stuff in the beginning each time I turn it on.
It's light, creative and very friendly.  My son reacts very positively to this and other "Blue's" videos.
My son gets very rude and pinches himself when he watches this show. We had to stop watching it.

My 20 month old grandson (and me) needed a new Blues clues DVD as he had watched his others multiple times and Grandma needed a break.  This one soon became his new favorite.  There's a variety of shows and he can really get into the imagination aspect
My kids love this. They start chanting 'Jungle' when they want to watch it again.
Was everything I expected and my kids love it! Packaging wasn't opened and was shipped real fast! Happy kids=Happy Mommy!
I am so happy to find DVDs such as this one to help complete my son's collection.  They are often hard to find otherwise.
